words.def: having or covered with hair
a covering for the body (or parts of it) consisting of a dense growth of threadlike structures (as on the human head)
open to or abounding in fresh air
grass mowed and cured for use as fodder
An upper-class person, especially a Sloane Ranger .
City in Australia (Proper noun)
To snarl; gnar.
a shag rug made in Sweden
a column of light (as from a beacon)
A person especially a student with a posh accent who looks down on those who are 'common'.
The yellowfin tuna .
A member of an ancient indigenous ethnolinguistic group of Nepal.
a mixture of gases (especially oxygen) required for breathing
A submergent coastal landform, often known as a drowned river valley.
yea; yes.
an expression of greeting
(astronomy) the angular distance of a celestial point measured westward along the celestial equator from the zenith crossing
academic year .
An instance of the interjection ah.
an agency of the United States Army responsible for providing timely and relevant and accurate and synchronized intelligence to tactical and operational and strategic level commanders
a colorless and odorless inert gas
